text: Need Chloe Lewis for Supercheap Auto campaign. Budget around $30,958, looking for 2 x Pinterest pin, 3 x LinkedIn post, 1 x Pinterest pin, 1 x 90-second product demo, 3 x Instagram post. 11 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs December 2025. Usage rights for 12 months. Engagement period: 2 months.
